Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:

::Koga Shuko motioned his men to stop::
"Unitron..."

"I'm detecting two signatures heading towards the base."
Unitron informed him, raising his laser rifle.

"Great..." Hades commented.

"Continue!" Koga Shuko yelled, the Predacons only a few miles away.

====================

::Punch heard voices, raising his plasma rifle, he stepped out in front of 
Zaruds, raising his rifle::
"Hello there, I wish to join, if that's not to much trouble."
